about.description: Aspiring web developer skilled in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, and frameworks like Node.js and Bootstrap. Passionate about building efficient, user-centered digital solutions and continuously growing through real-world experience.

projects.title: PG Result Management System (UNOM)
projects.description: A web system developed to automate result management for postgraduate students using Node.js, MySQL, Handlebars, and Bootstrap.

projects.title: Anime Recommendation Engine
projects.description: Built using Python, Flask, scikit-learn, and Firebase to suggest anime based on user preferences with cosine similarity.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my skills, projects, and experiences. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

projects.title: GuessMaster
projects.description: GuessMaster is an interactive web application that predicts the number you are thinking of! Through a series of four simple yes/no questions, the system uses your answers to determine the exact number you have in mind.

projects.title: RTO Finder
projects.description: A web application that helps users find the nearest RTO office based on their location. It uses Google Maps API for location services and provides information about RTO offices.

projects.title: Blood Donor Finder
projects.description: A web application that connects blood donors with those in need. It allows users to register as donors and search for available donors based on blood type and location.

projects.title: Password Strength Checker
projects.description: A web application that checks the strength of a password based on various criteria such as length, character variety, and common patterns.

projects.title: Random Password Generator
projects.description: A web application that generates random passwords based on user-defined criteria such as length and character types. It ensures strong password creation for enhanced security.

internships.description: Worked on WordPress-based websites, customized themes/plugins, and collaborated on improving UI/UX designs.
Built front-end and back-end for an Anime Recommendation System and optimized application performance in a team setting.

educations.degree: Master of Science in Information Technology

educations.institution: Apollo Arts And Science College, Poonamallee
